channel.title: Numbers 317 v1.4 [PI]
channel.description:
Note: I'm still gonna host this for awhile.
Welcome to Numbers, my small server based from Exion. There are a few nice features in here though.
List of features: Everything from [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443234.msg3254639.html#msg3254639]this[/url] topic. Pk Points highscores All 4 godwars bosses Spiritual mages Real runescape prices (as of Jan 29th 2011) Real runescape monster drops ::sell (gives 75% of an items value. EG: ::sell 4151 gives you 75% of the amount of coins a whip is worth) ::checkprice (Gives you the actual price and the ::sell value) Working runecrafting besides blood/soul altars Improved mine, added rune essence rocks and runite rocks Clue scrolls without interfaces (Explained in a picture below) Crystal key box New dungeon at ::monsters Fast xp rates All skills etc A lot more I'm forgetting :P
Pictures:
Clue Scrolls. Basically what it does is when you click a clue scroll, it gives a certain amount of gold, the actual reward, a hatchet, a pickaxe, a gem, and some runes. For example:
Level 1 Clue: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2mo4ev6.jpg[/img]
Level 2: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/1g14ig.jpg[/img]
Level 3: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2jecigm.jpg[/img]
Pk points highscores: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/33dz9sz.jpg[/img]
Zamorak boss (Exion only had the other 3): [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/dm38rt.jpg[/img]
::sell command (I typed ::sell 6585, and yes this checks if you have the item..): [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/34osivs.jpg[/img]
::checkprice command (I typed ::checkprice 6585): [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2ii8upx.jpg[/img]
Well I can't think of anything else to make pictures of, so without further ado, credits
Exion - Base I Vain I - Help with A LOT of stuff X Entinity X ;) - Base for pk highscores Sanity - Project Insanity Me - Other features n' shit
Download links: [url=http://numbers.sytes.net/c/clientv1-4.rar]Client[/url] [url=http://numbers.sytes.net/z/Server.rar]Server[/url]
If you need mirrors, ask.
Enjoy! :)

item.title: Numbers 317 v1.4 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Note: I’m still gonna host this for awhile.

Welcome to Numbers, my small server based from Exion. There are a few nice features in here though.

List of features:
Everything from this topic.
Pk Points highscores
All 4 godwars bosses
Spiritual mages
Real runescape prices (as of Jan 29th 2011)
Real runescape monster drops
::sell (gives 75% of an items value. EG: ::sell 4151 gives you 75% of the amount of coins a whip is worth)
::checkprice (Gives you the actual price and the ::sell value)
Working runecrafting besides blood/soul altars
Improved mine, added rune essence rocks and runite rocks
Clue scrolls without interfaces (Explained in a picture below)
Crystal key box
New dungeon at ::monsters
Fast xp rates
All skills etc
A lot more I’m forgetting

Pictures:

Clue Scrolls. Basically what it does is when you click a clue scroll, it gives a certain amount of gold, the actual reward, a hatchet, a pickaxe, a gem, and some runes. For example:

Level 1 Clue:

2mo4ev6.jpg782×559

Level 2:

1g14ig.jpg781×556

Level 3:

2jecigm.jpg779×558

Pk points highscores:

33dz9sz.jpg776×557

Zamorak boss (Exion only had the other 3):

::sell command (I typed ::sell 6585, and yes this checks if you have the item…):

34osivs.jpg775×560

::checkprice command (I typed ::checkprice 6585):

2ii8upx.jpg778×557

Well I can’t think of anything else to make pictures of, so without further ado, credits

Exion - Base
I Vain I - Help with A LOT of stuff
X Entinity X - Base for pk highscores
Sanity - Project Insanity
Me - Other features n’ shit

Download links:
Client
Server

If you need mirrors, ask.

Enjoy!
